resources: Two factor authentication Can't connect to network You need an internet connection to turn two-factor authentication on or off. Try to reconnect Checking status... Two factor authentication is off Turn on two-factor authentication 1. To enable two-factor authentication, make sure you have an authenticator app installed on your device. We recommend Google Authenticator, but you can use any TOTP-compatible app. 2. Link your authenticator app using this configuration key on the authenticator app. 3. Enter the code from your authenticator app below. Google Authenticator App" Authentication code Failed to turn on two-factor authentication Turn on Turning on Back to settings Next Establishing connection... Which server do you want to connect to? Server URL Two-factor authentication is on. Turning off two-factor authentication To disable two-factor authentication open your authenticator app. Enter the code from your authenticator app below. Authentication code Turn off Fail to turn two factor authentication off.
